Package engine.main

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameEventListener
    Interface that allows for a GameObject to act on GameEvents.
    GameScript
    GameScript class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Collider
    A collider component for a GameObject.
    GameComponent
    Game component base class.
    GameEvent
    Basis for a basic event system, the event itself.
    GameObject
    Base class for all GameObjects in the game.
    GameScreen
    The game screen.
    JavaEngine
    My basic Java game engine.
    KeyboardInputHandler
    Keyboard input handler for the engine.
    MouseInputHandler
    Mouse input handler for the Java engine.
    ObjectController
    Manages all GameObjects in the game.
    SpriteGraphic
    The graphic object associated with a GameObject.
